customer_reviews.title: Useful but when attached changing table slopes to the left
customer_reviews.text: Overall we love this Pak n' Play and use it every day. The diaper organizer is very useful. However, the changing table, when attached to the Pak n' Play slopes slightly to the left which causes the baby to slide to the left of the table during changes.

product_meta.title: Safety 1st Safe Stages Play Yard, Gentle Lace
product_meta.description: Keep baby close by and comfortable with the Safe Stages Play Yard. This three-way convertible play yard adjusts easily to keep your growing baby comfortable through three stages. The newborn napper is perfect for newborns up to 15 pounds and includes a fun toy bar for visual stimulation. For more room to stretch out, the full size bassinet can be used up to 20 pounds. Switching to full play yard mode to give your child a wonderful place for both naps and play. The convenient changing table can be used up to 25 pounds. It can be used on either side, making it easy to get the perfect position when setting it up in different rooms. Storage to keep diapers, wipes and other necessities is close at hand. (It may not make the changes fun, but it does make them easier and more comfortable for both of you. ) In full-sized play yard mode, there's plenty to see. Thanks to the breathable mess sides, you'll be able to easily check in from across the room. Your baby will stay safely out from under foot while still being able to watch all the action. The included carry bag lets you fold the play yard down and easily stow it away in a closet for storage or in the car for a trip away from home.
feature_bullets: Adjustable for growing baby: Newborn napper to 15 pounds, Full size bassinet to 20 pounds, Spacious play yard for naps and play
Easy clean, wipe able changing pad, for baby up to 25 pounds
Storage keeps changing essentials right at hand
Changer and newborn napper can be used on either side, making it easy to set up where you want it in your own home
Toy bar with toys for your child's enjoyment; SecureTech locking system lets you easily see that the play yard is set up securely and ready for use
